Package Database

Class Appointments

java.lang.Object
Database.Appointments
All Implemented Interfaces:
SQLQuery
public class Appointments extends Object implements SQLQuery
Maintains an observable list of appointments, and enables robust functionality thereupon.

  • Method Details

    • add

      public static void add(Appointment appointment)
      Adds an appointment to the current list of appointments. RUNTIME ERROR: .contains() was not returning true when passed a duplicate appointment, so I implemented a simple for loop to verify whether an appointment was present before adding it.

    • remove

      public static void remove(Appointment appointment)
      Removes an appointment from the list of appointments, and updates the database accordingly.

    • update

      public static void update(Appointment appointmentToUpdate, String title, String description, String location, String contact, String type, Timestamp startTime, Timestamp endTime, int customerApptId, int userId)
      Updates an appointment in the list of appointments, and updates the database accordingly.

      public static boolean customerHasAppointments(int customerId)

    • load

      public static void load()
      Loads all of the appointments in the database into an observable list.

    • appointmentsByContact

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> appointmentsByContact(String contactName) throws SQLException
      Returns an observable list of appointments associated with a chosen contact's name. RUNTIME ERROR: Accidentally selected from contacts table by CUSTOMER_ID rather than CONTACT_ID
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • thisMonth

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> thisMonth()
      Returns an observable list of appointments scheduled this month. LAMBDA JUSTIFICATION: The scheduledThisMonth lambda was developed solely for the sake of increasing clarity and readability in the generation of the appointments for the month. The operation is simple, but having several lines of code passed as an argument for a stream binder is cumbersome.

    • thisWeek

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> thisWeek()
      Returns an observable list of appointments scheduled for this week. LAMBDA JUSTIFICATION: The scheduledThisWeek lambda was developed solely for the sake of increasing clarity and readability in the generation of the appointments for the week. The operation is simple, but having several lines of code passed as an argument for a stream binder is cumbersome.

    • generateUniqueAppointmentId

      public static int generateUniqueAppointmentId()
      Returns a unique appointment id to prevent duplication of primary key values.

    • filterByMonth

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> filterByMonth(javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> appointments, String month)
      Returns an observable list of appointments scheduled on a selected month (neglecting the year).

    • filterByType
